BioRecovery and Domestic Professional Cleaning (BDPC)

Crime Scene Cleanup and Biohazard Remediation

Helping you through your crisis:  We are specialists in the UNIQUE aspects of trauma Cleaning.

There are many considerations for family / loved ones / friends when choosing a company to handle clean up or bio-remediation services after a traumatic event.  

BDPC is a licensed, bonded, and insured.  BDPC is operated by caring compassionate individuals that specialise in the field of decontamination and restoration of biohazard environments as a result of tragic deaths Our first priorty is to help you when it matters the most, easing psychological, emotional and physical trauma in times of crisis.

BDPC will help you through the process of sanitation, decontamination, and restoration of your home or business.  Other companies only “decontaminate,” leaving the home or business restoration for you to finish, essentially solving one crisis but leaving you with another in your most critical and vulnerable times.

    In Cases Of :-

  • Suicide
  • Unattended Death
  • Homicide
  • Industrial Accidents
